User.title: User
User.description: Represents a user of the application.

id.description: The unique identifier for the user, matching the Firebase Auth UID.

photoURL.description: URL of the user's profile picture.

title.description: A title for the chat session, usually the first user prompt.

createdAt.description: Timestamp when the chat was created.

userId.description: The ID of the user who owns this chat.

ChatMessage.title: Chat Message
ChatMessage.description: A message within a chat conversation.

role.description: The role of the message sender.

content.description: The text content of the message.

image.description: An optional image URL attached to the message.

createdAt.description: Timestamp when the message was created.

userId.description: The ID of the user who owns this message.
